choices: Your mother, Maddison?  (Shrunk at home)
Your aunt, Cassandra?  (Shrunk at Aunt's house)
Your friend, Kelsey?  (Shrunk at friend's house)
Your teacher, Ms. B?  (Shrunk with teacher)
Not a clue  (Shrunk with strangers)
1.content:
"Ugh, what was in that apple?" you moan as you stagger to your feet. It felt like you had been hit on the head and dragged through sharp stones. "That wasn't a magic apple, it was a drugged apple." This wasn't the first time you woke up in an unfamiliar place, so like always you peered around for landmarks. As you turn around, you see something strange.

"Oh my god... That woman is massive! She's as tall as a building!" And indeed she was. Sitting on a equally massive couch was a woman bigger than anything you'd ever seen. "The apple was magic... Excuse me! Miss! Down here! Can you hear me?" You called to her, and it seemed like she noticed. Her hand, which was big enough to crush you three times over, came rushing towards you...

...And shoved right past to pick up a tall glass of water. You were sent tumbling onto your butt, shocked and confused. "Excuse me miss, but I need some help, and that was quite rude. Can you please help?" You began to ask this when a bigger problem emerged. From below the table, the mystery girl swung her feet up and heavily set them right next to where you were standing.

In your human sciences class, you had recently gone over average sizes of human body parts, so from a quick glance at the relative height of the woman's foot (which is an average size of 11 inches) and could guess your own height to be a little less than half of that, around five inches or so. At that height, you should be clearly noticeable. Something was wrong. You scamper onto her huge ankle and dashed over to her lap. You tried again, this time hopping up and down to see if it would help. "Miss! Miss!! MISS!! PLEASE HEAR ME!!! I NEED HELP!" Nothing. She was oblivious to your plight. This must have been part of the magic in the apple, making it so you would be unnoticeable. This was bad, because if you can't be seen you can't be saved.

"Okay, no time to panic. I need a plan so I won't panic..." You start by looking at the woman's face. Maybe she is familiar.
1.title: Lost with no hope

choices: Your Mother's hair
Jordan's body
Across the hall into a pile of Dani's dolls
11.content:
"Mom? Oh dear." Not to be mean, but Maddie wasn't always to most observant. With the apple's magic preventing direct contact, it would be extremely difficult to interact with her. On the bright side, if you managed a way to get her attention, she'd be sure to help. The best way to get that attention...

"Mom! Jordan made a mess in her diaper again! That loud voice coming from the other room would be your 10 year old sister, Dani, while the Jordan in question was your baby sister. You look towards your mother and hear her sigh before bellowing out, "Coming dear!" You look for a handhold, but your mom is wearing some pretty skimpy short, and you are left rolling down her bare skin as she stands. You hit the knee and go flying off into the carpet below. You begin to stand when a shadow is cast over you; a quick look up shows the sky is pink, wrinkly and covered in a light film of sweat: Your mother's foot.

"No mom! NO!" You cry out and flinch as the sky smashes into you. The foot, over twice your length, is barely on your body for a second, but it was enough time to coat you in some of that sweat, along with knocking the air out of your lungs as the powerful ball of her foot smashed into your upper torso. Groaning as the massive steps tread away, you realize that you suffered no major injuries other than your ego being popped. You climb back to your feet and start running to the hallway. Maybe one of your sisters could see you.

You sprint as hard as you can to Jordan's room and in five minutes you make it. On the opposite side of the room, your mother is just finishing up with the baby, so you push out one last burst of speed to reach her, only to have your plan stopped by Dani, who walks from the side of the room and stops right behind Maddie. You try to slow down, but end up smashing into her colossal bare heel. Even at 10 years old, Dani's foot is about twice your size. In your awe at how small you are, you are unable to move as she takes a half step back, right onto you. Her toes end up covering your feet, and as she stands in the same spot listening to your mother explain something, her toes grab at the carpet, and end up snagging you too. When Mom finishes her talk, Dani, being an excitable little girl, jumps up in agreement, sending you flying through the air, landing on top of
11.title: Family Feet

choices: Jump into the papers!!
Rappel down the hair!!
The doorbell rings, Maddison shakes her head before you can decide!!
111.content:
Flying through the air, you scream out in terror!! That magic apple had caused quite the ruckus for you.

Bamf!!

You landed in some kind of tangly. . oh no. Looking a bit more, you realize you were on the top of your mother's head!! Trying to get her attention, you reach down to pull as hard as you can on her hair. Something weird happened though. As you grasped onto the hair, it was possible for you to hold onto it, but pulling it became impossible. The magic again. Whatever kind of magic that was seemed to be preventing you from getting noticed. You would need to find a way around it to be seen. . .or at the very least. . survive.

With the baby's diaper changed, Maddison turned on the television nearby. Switching on Netflix, she put on a kids show for Dani and Jordan. . but mostly Dani.

"Ooooh!! Yeah!!" Dani squealed as Dora the Explorer's sounds blared into the room.

The voice of your sister was so loud and painful, you wanted to grab your ears, but if you let go you'd go tumbling down the giant!! Holding on tight, your mother walked into the other room.

Boom!!

Boom!!

Boom!!

Boom!!

As she stomped to and fro, you were wobbled back and forth on top of her. At your size, you should have at least made some kind of impact. The only way you'd be seen at this rate is if you somehow altered something. . left a note or changed her scenery. Maddison was now in the kitchen, looking over some papers from the mail. You guessed that they were probably bills.

As she sorted them, she reached to the side and grabbed a small plate. On the plate was two pop tarts. She must have had them from before but hadn't had time to prepare them. Thinking things over, you decided that now you would make your move. With all those papers below you, you might be able to jump down so your mother could see you. Or, you might try rappelling down your mother's face with her long hair.

You had to make up your mind soon, before something happened to stop you!!
111.title: A hairy situation. .

choices: Nadia, a friend of yours from school
Aunt Cassandra, here with her daughters
It's actually Dani.  The babysitter must be elsewhere.
1113.content:
Ding-dong!

Your mother (and current seat) lets out a sigh. She quickly turns on her heel to get the door, which catches you off guard. Your hands drop the hair and you fall backwards. The wooden floor rushes up to meet you, and it's "hello" was forceful enough to knock the sense out of you.

Not completely unconscious, you shakily pulled yourself up to your feet. Your view of the world was blurred, and your head hurt like hell. You try to take a step, but your body rejects that plan and instead ejects your lunch and falls over. End result: You're face first in a pool of your own vomit, without the coordination to get back up. Fearful thoughts start to bubble up; do you have a concussion?

Before the thought train can reach its destination, you start to hear words. Peering up, you think you can see your mother's feet walking through the kitchen, followed closely by Dani's... and someone else's? It's hard to tell if your mind is playing tricks or not. They begin to speak, but you can only pick up snippets of dialogue through the ringing in your ears.

"... break... she'll babysit... not that I... be goo... she is your..."

The pounding feet get ever closer as the procession of people walk through the kitchen. As their shadows cover you, your eyes close and you lose consciousness.

The delightful smell of stale vomit wakes you up not long later. The hardwood floor of the kitchen has been replaced by the white carpet of the family room. You sit up carefully, not wanting to aggravate any injuries, only to find that you feel much better than before. Odd, but so is shrinking and becoming functionally invisible. Having reassured your health, you jump straight to your feet, smashing your head against the soft ceiling you hadn't noticed. Although the angle is odd, it isn't too hard for you to determine with 90% accuracy that you are under a foot that's dangling off the couch. As you crawl out from under it, you remember something about a babysitter. Looking up, you determine that this is:
1113.title: Someone get the door!

choices: She stops running around
You slip
112.content:
From your little sisters toes, you are catapulted through the air. You can't get any sense of direction as you flip around, hearing your sisters voice moving all around you. You slam against something soft and do another flip and you manage to land. You are out of breath and amazed to not only be alive, but uninjured. You get up off of the soft surface and look up. A pair of fat legs extend out in front of you. You turn around and look at the belly and face of your enormous baby sister. "J-jordan..." You mumble in amazement as your baby sister giggles. It rumbles through you. Turning around again, you see your mother putting the cleaning supplies away. Then she grabs Jordan and lifts her.

As the world shifts you grab the elastic at the front of her diaper and dangle from it as your sister is taken down to the floor. "MOM! Stop!" You plead out as she begins walking away, followed by your sister. Now it's just you and Jordan. She immediately begins running around. You continuously flap against her diaper as her legs move back and forth. You begin to want to let go, but if you do, her feet could crush you to bits. You begin to slip and finally...
112.title: Jordan's body

choices: Jordan, who lost her pacifier
Dani, who is going to play dress up
Your mom, who's giving some dolls to charity
113.content:
Dani's toes release you from their grip mid jump. Your body is tossed like a toy and you go soaring across the sky. Attempting to take control of the situation, you try and guide your decent, only to discover yourself helpless as you are flung into a pile of plastic people. After impact, you sit up on Barbie and take a moment to assess the situation. You completely helpless in your current state. Hell, you've been stepped on twice and neither of the two women even knew it. And the goddamned doll you were sitting on was over twice your height!
"I wish I wasn't so helpless."
"Initializing wishing matrix... Stand by for wish..."
What the hell? Your pocket was talking to you! You reached into it and felt something round and about the size of an apple. You yanked it out and found the same apple you bit into that started this whole mess.
"You can talk?"
"Affirmative. Please make request."
"Make me normal again!"
"Error. Unable to interfere with primary objective. Please attempt again.
"What do you mean?"
"When first consumed, I automatically grant a wish based on your innermost desire. Yours was to have a unique adventure. Other wishes can be made subsequently, but they cannot go against the primary objective. Please make request.
"Okaaay. so how would I get normal again?"
"Fulfill primary objective: Have unique adventure.
"Great. How about..." Before you could finish, you were knocked off your perch by a massive hand. You slid down an assortment of Barbies with varied outfits and hairstyles before coming to a stop under a nude one. Shoving Barbie's ass off your face, you see the apple wedged firmly between the breasts of the doll on top, which was currently in the grip of:
113.title: An apple a day keeps Barbie away

choices: Slumber party
Pool party
1131.content:
"No Jordan! That's not a binky! Stop!" You run along the pile of dolls to your baby sister, trying to stop her from consuming the apple. Apprehensively, you watch as barbie gets closer and closer to her mouth, and right as you get to her leg, she begins to suck on it. Hard. Even from down here, you can hear her slobbering and drooling, and in your heart you know the apple slipped away, taking your chances of salvation with it. But wait... There! In the corner of her mouth! Something's coming out, and you hope to god it's the apple.

Splash!

Spit. That's all that came out and now you're soaked. You fall to your knees. That apple was your way out of this hellhole, and now it's gone, sucked down by an oblivious toddler. As tears start to form and you begin to cry, you hear a voice calling out:

"Primary objective modified: Pacifier."

The apple! You watch as the doll began to glow, getting brighter every second. Jordan was shocked, and yanked the soaking Barbie out of her mouth. The doll flashed like a light bulb, and when it was done, it was not longer there. In its place was... A pacifier!

Jordan make a happy sound and popped it in her mouth before getting up and waddling away. You watched her massive footsteps, then looked back to where she was sitting. In her place was the apple! But it wasn't the same. Now it was full sized. You run up to it and try to talk to it again.

"Excuse me apple, can I still get the wish?"
"I have been reset thanks to a primary wish being fulfilled. To receive further wishes, please consume me."
"Not a problem!" You stretch your mouth open and bite right into the flesh of the apple. Or I should say you tried to. Whatever the apple was made of, it's skin was too tough for your little teeth. Good thing you don't give up that easily! You look around the room for a way to cut it open... By Dani's shoe, there was a pencil! You run up to it, and right as you grab it, Dani's door swings open. Not wanting to be trodden on again, you move away from the shoes to the wall as your sister enters her room.
Don'tseetheappleDon'tseetheappleDon'tseetheapple
"Hey look! An apple! Perfect for the party." As she reaches down to grab it, you curse your bad luck. You need that, and if she's going to party with it, you'd have to follow her. You don't have much time, as she's slipping purple socks on and will soon be leaving. You need a ride, and the closest option is... Godamn it. Her shoes.

You scoot up to her blue converse sneakers. You hated the idea, but from experience you knew a little trampling wouldn't kill you, even it it would hurt. Plus, you didn't have to time to come up with a better idea, so here you are, lowering yourself into a size 7 shoe, praying that she'll take it off at the party. Without a moment to spare you slip in, right as she grabs to shoe and takes it to her bed. She sits down and slides on the shoe you're not in, leaving you plenty of time to watch her purple clad foot hover above you. You're immediately regretting this decision. Her sock is tattered and stained, and your about to get real close to it. Before you can try to run, her toes flex and dive to the opening of the shoe. The floor is tilted and you slide to the toe end. You see her toes clench once at the insole before they rocket towards you. Helpless, you scream as they over take you. The frayed sock is rough to your skin and the pressure is nearly unbearable, even before she sets her foot down. As soon as she ties her laces, she slams her foot down. Dani was a petite girl, but to you she felt like a steamroller. Every step rocked her foot into you, grinding you like you weren't even a person. To be fair, at this point she didn't know you were. Unfortunately, it felt like her toes did. She always was a bit of a fidget, and now you were getting the brunt of it. Your head was kneaded like dough under the ball of her foot, rolled like a pebble between her sweaty toes and ground to a bloody pulp like a worthless bug. Within 15 minutes, you heard a snap, and you lost consciousness.

You awoke some time later, wrapped in a ball of sweaty purple fabric. Your head is light and your mouth tastes like copper. From outside your purple prison, you hear the squeals and sounds of a bunch of preteen girls, and know you've arrived. In the fabric of the sock, there's a hole to the outside, so you start to move towards it. Going is slow, as it seems you've lost the ability to move your right arm. You're unsure if you'll ever be able to again, but at the moment, there are more pressing concerns. You manage to pull yourself free of the soaking bundle, revealing to you:
1131.title: Child's toy to foot toy

choices: To the apple!
Another choice for another plan!
11311.content:
You slump onto the soft, pink carpet, glad to be alive. When you catch your breath, you look up and see the largest, pinkest bedroom you've ever laid eyes on, filled with 6 Godzilla-sized preteens, all sitting in a circle about a meter away from the shoe pile. You quickly take in your surroundings, noting the location of the two doors, the bed and dresser, and a massive pile of stuffed animals before finding what you're looking for: the apple. There it was, on top of a table in a stack of other fruit. You don't know why Dani needed fruit for a slumber party, but it's not important right now. You get to your feet, but as you take a step you feel burning pain in your left leg. It's broken and bent at a 45 degree angle, making it completely useless. Your guess about how indestructible you are was wrong.

Feeling defeat from being under her feet, you slump back onto the ground. If you can't walk, there's no way for you to get that apple. You might as well lay here and die. You'll probably get trampled to death when the young girls get their footwear.

No. I'm not dying here, not like this. I wanted an adventure, now I'm getting it. The broken limb is just part of the challenge. COME AT ME WORLD! You can't walk, but you can at least drag yourself across the carpet. All you need is a plan. Are you going directly for the apple, or are you going try another way to it? The girls are being rather still right now; maybe you can hitch a ride? Or maybe you can crawl your way underneath the door. Who knows what can help you out there?
11311.title: A slight break in events

choices: bobbing for apples?"
making apple pie?"
113111.content:
You take a deep breath, steel your nerves, and do any other cliches that'll help your journey. One hand at a time, you pull yourself towards that table. The journey's long, but it should be safe. The girls are too busy gossiping in the middle of the living room to be a hindrance to you.

Do you know what an old carpet smells like? Musty, dirty, not very pleasant. Well, you're currently dragging your face through all of that. Sure, it's helping to dry Dani's sweat off of you, but the smell is only getting replaced. You're slowly beginning to smell a lot like mildew.

An hour passes. With your small size and new found disability, crossing the room took a lot. Finally, you get to your destination: the towering table. Sounds a bit like a shitty adventure story. You'll have to find a way up there, but with your leg in such a state, simply climbing the table leg is out of the question. You take a quick look back over your shoulder, towards the girls.

They don't seem to be as occupied as earlier. One's on her phone, one's half asleep, and one has a book out. (What a nerd. Reading. Pssh.) Your grace period looks like it's running out. And as if on cue, one of the girls gets up. She walks over towards the door, and you faintly hear her say, "Who's ready for...
113111.title: Like the tortoise, slow and steady wins the race.

choices: Short path
Safe path
11312.content:
The acrid scent of sweat was quickly overpowered by the air rushing in. Chlorine, if your nose was correct. The chipped paint of an old locker surrounded you, but the door was mercifully open. A quick hop over the side of the shoe, and you were looking out into the world.

Yeah, it was the pool. The locker was situated near to the pool, and it was rather empty today. Only a small group of young girls were in it. Well, and the teenage lifeguard, who was sitting bored-like in the lifeguard tower. Seems like the place was rented out for the party.

Feeling was already beginning to return to the arm, so no major losses on the ride here. First priority was to find that apple. That was the key to survival here. It wasn't in the locker, so it had to be out in the greater pool area. Squinting, you could just make out a table with stuff on it over on the other side of the pool. It'd be quite a trek for someone of your stature, but it was the best place to look.

Vaulting down to the warm concrete, you start to walk towards your goal. Strictly speaking, the quickest route would be following the edge of the pool around to the tables. That would be dangerous though, as you'd pass right by the wild splashes of the party. It might be a smarter choice to go around the lifeguard tower. With less screeching pre-teens that way, you'd be much safer.

It's a trade off: safety or speed?
11312.title: Public Pool

choices: ...the girls started splashing, causing you to slip and fall into the pool
...one of them got out to get something from the table
113121.content:
You sigh and thought "Well I can't stay like this any longer, I gotta get back to normal fast." You don't like to take this route but you feared that one or all of the girls will take the apple away if you're not fast enough. You just have to be careful around the edges though.

You ran to the very edge of the deep blue 'lake'. It looked very much like one at this size and the giants could be nothing more than mountains or even floating continents. Looking it closer, you can spot a small piece of twig floating on the water and watched as it joggled back and forth by the waves created by these swimmers. "I can even imagine what it feels to be like that twig..." you said with a shiver and focused on your destination. "That apple is gotta be on that table...I hope." you said as you started your trek around the ledges while covering your ears at the same time from the loud screaming preteens which was unbearably loud on this point.

So far so good, you were unharmed right now. Looking at the girls, they are just calm at the moment and not as loud and wild as before. "I can do this...I can do this!" you continued chanting it several times during your careful stroll around the pool. When you look ahead, you realized that you were now getting closer to the table. Yes, you managed to survive!

You were just about to leave the pool's edge when suddenly...
113121.title: The dangerous path

choices: It's a girl about to cannonball right onto you
It's the lifeguard, telling the girls to quit their roughhousing
1131211.content:
Just about to turn around and head for the table, you're caught off guard by the eruption of pool water as surfaces. With a terrifying roar the waves rush towards you and envelop you in their soaking grip. Pulled by gravity the water rushes back into the pool, dragging you along with it.

You hold back a shout, tossed beneath the surface in a disorienting cloud of frothing bubbles. Blind, you kick out, desperately praying that you're headed for the surface. Instead, you slam face first into the taut stomach of one of Dani's friends, an endless wall of skin that stretched out in all directions. You push off it, kicking away and back into the abyss, but you hardly manage to float away when her hand, easily the length of your body, scoops down beneath you and propels you to the surface.

You breach, screaming as you and a fifty foot wall of water are launched through the air. The flat and unforgiving chest of a young brunette meets you with a thud, and you plummet back into the water.

Air, you think, resurfacing and retching up the chlorinated water. You sense movement, however, and turn to see the new girl posed to strike; her arm crooked and held behind her, her hand flat above her head. Fruitlessly you call for her attention, but she doesn't notice and begins her assault.

She lays into the water, slapping right then left then right palm into the water to force cold spray into her friends. Her strikes all hit home, driving into your head like a nailgun. You see stars as she slaps you down, pushing deep under again. You sink, stunned, below her waist, finally losing momentum and coming to a stop around her knees.

Above, the girl gets splashed and, unable to take what she dishes out, flinches back. Her legs instinctively lash out and find you. The rest of the air in your lungs is forced out as her toes jam under your rib cage, sending you hurdling through the water in a trail of bubbles.

You can't take much more of this. You angle towards the light on the water's surface, running on fumes and hoping to god another girl won't interrupt.

Everything starts to go dark. For a second you're worried that you're out of air and time, but you quickly realize it's a shadow, eclipsing the sun from above the water.

This can't be good, can it?
1131211.title: Worst. Pool party. Ever.

choices: Into the table full of food
Into a beach chair
Into the bodies one of the girl or lifeguard
11312111.content:
No, no it can't.

High above the surface is yet another girl and she apparently got out of the pool, standing on top of the edge. By the way how she poses, you realized that she's about to jump into the pool and you're right in her path! This won't be such a soft landing for you...

The young girl leaps up while in a crouched position and goes straight to your location. Even worse, a cannonball!

Aware that you have zero time to dodge the upcoming plunge, you squeezed your eyes and braced yourself.

SPLASH!!!!!!!!!!!!

The impact was even more stronger than before and you were once again launched into the air but this time, a good hundreds of feet upwards into the air. You screamed as you speed away like a jet plane taking off.

You stopped after a good several feet from the pool, but you didn't have time to recover because you came speeding downwards. You screamed yet again as you fell straight down to who know where; you didn't have the time to look where you are going to land on.
11312111.title: Up Up And Away

choices: Grab a nose hair.  Maybe indirect contact works?
Drop down and hope for the best.
12.content:
"Aunt Cassie? I can work with this." You weren't her favorite nephew, but someone related by blood sure as hell would try to help if they could, right? Either way, you still needed a way to get that help. As she flicked through the TV channels with her left hand, you paced on her lap.

"If I could... No. How about I... Wait, no. What about... Damn it!" Your thoughts were getting nowhere quickly, and you needed to act before she got up and you got stranded. With all of your attention directed to this, you didn't see the slight tear in her denim and by the time you figured it out, you had fallen face first into the glass of water she had next to her leg.

You peer up, hopeful for a easy way out, but the glass was tall and the slides slick. You can't even try to tip the glass before five fleshy digits press into the sides of the clear container, squishing and losing color mere inches from your soaking wet body. You knew what was coming next, and screamed in terror. "Aunty! Please don't drink me! I don't want to die!" Her lips spread apart and the glass was tilted. As her lips press against the glass and water begins to flow through her mouth, you try to swim away. In the end, the force of suction was too much, and feet first you were pulled in, right up to your shoulders. At that point, your five inch long body wouldn't fit anymore, but it didn't stop the situation from being incredibly uncomfortable. Her lips were chapped and tore at your shirt, her tongue was slimy and stuck to your pants, and of course there was water flooding over your sorry face. As the glass emptied, Aunt Cassie set the glass back down on the table, and unknowingly left you hanging out of her mouth.

This could be trouble. If she saw one of her two daughters, she would begin talking, which would be very painful, if not deadly, for a man of your stature. Feeling the urge to escape, you wiggle your arms out and reach up, securing one arm on each nostril. You hoped on last time to be noticed, but when she was still oblivious, you kicked against her tongue and shoved. Your lower torso swung out, leaving you hanging by the nostrils. What now?
12.title: Gulp

choices: Make it to Cassandra's room without a hitch
Problem with the daughters...
121.content:
While Cassie was still stilling still, you had to try and get her attention. You could tell she wouldn't be able to directly spot you, but what if you could trigger an indirect response? How about a sneeze? With this in mind, you shove your arm as far into her nose as possible. After digging through some shot, you feel a good sized nose hair, and you pull.

The effects are immediate. Her nose twitches, nearly shaking you off, and she stands up to walk to a tissue box. You pull again, this time harder. "Ugh, my nose is so itchy today." She pulls up the tissue to her nose, completely covering you in it, and she blows as hard as she can. You are thrown right into the tissue as gallons of gooey snot pour all over you. Your mouth opens as an involuntary urge to scream, but it fills up so quickly you only get a gurgle out. With her nose clear, she balls up the tissue (which forces you into the fetal position) and chucks the snot-rag towards the garbage.

From your current vantage point, you can't see all that much. However, you could feel the Kleenex hit a solid surface and fall downwards. With the motions over, you pry open the rag and pull yourself out. Although the plan wasn't perfect, it did reveal that it is possible to be noticed. It just wasn't going to be easy being noticed as a person. With the back of the tissue, you wipe off most of the goop, and begin to take stock of your surroundings. The tissue had landed far from Casandra, leaving you much closer to the kitchen, which, if your remember right from the last time you visited, leads to the two restrooms and the bedrooms. The bedrooms would be the best goal, because while sleeping, you could easily get to the right spot to trigger these reactions you needed.
121.title: Gesundheit

choices: Aunt Cass is right there!
Someone else is there!
No one's here.  Let's do something else.
1211.content:
You had to admit, being tiny gave you some incredible views. Everyday objects became monoliths to living gods, towering high above you. Maybe you were being a bit dramatic, but staring up at a refrigerator that rivaled the height of skyscrapers made quite an impact. The whole situation was a brand new perspective, both figuratively and literally. You never realized how big the insignificant details could be. You'd spent a lot of your childhood in this house, but you'd never noticed the slight fray in the grey carpets, or the minor chipping along the baseboard's paint. Now, these details made up your world.

Other than blowing your mind, the walk to Cassandra's room was rather simple. Her daughters never showed up, and navigation was simply done by memory. Within an hour, you found yourself in front of the massive purple doorway, complete with the giant door. The giant closed door, that is.

Phooey. How in the seven Hells were you supposed to get past that? Various plans plagiarized from cartoons and television popped into mind. Climb the door to get to the knob? No, the paint wasn't that chipped. Slide under the door? Nope, you were ankle deep in carpet; too big to fit. Wait until someone else opens the door? No, that...

...Might work.

It'd be boring as hell and a bit of a waste of time, but it would definitely get it open. You move to the side and sit in the carpet. The plush fibers and quiet air lull you into a sense of security, then to sleep.
1211.title: One door closed...

choices: Time for bed Lydia!
You need a bath Lydia!
1212.content:
The kitchen was a nice, polished hardwood floor that lead to you sliding across it much more frequently than you'd have liked, but other than a few bumps, you got into the connecting hallway without any major problems. As you entered the hall, you began to hear voices. This must be where the daughters are, and nothing is more dangerous than a girl 10 times your size who doesn't know you are there. Trying to stay safe, you sidled along the siding, but the carpeting in the area was proving difficult. Seeing a clear area, you sprint over to it. You begin to use it as a path before a whirring sounds starts up. Feeling a breeze, you look down and realize that you're standing on a heat vent. As the air gets stronger, you get lifted in the air, unable to do anything other than float at about one foot off the ground.

As you float helpless, you hear the girls get louder, and watch as Eliza the 6 year old and Lydia the 4 year old come rushing into the hall, with a path that leads right over your vent. You scream and wave, but it is useless as you float there at the 6 year old's knee height. Her knee comes rushing in, and you grasp out wildly as you are forcefully shoved out of the wind current. You grab for her dress but fail, and her leg ends up kicking you forward, just far enough so her next step lands painfully on you. Her bare foot (which is still much bigger than you) uses your body as a launching pad, forcing you into the ground and leaving you to be trodden on by Lydia's foot, which is only a couple of inches bigger than you. You can immediately notice a difference in the pain levels, and in one more area. The 4 year old's foot was sticky, probably after stepping in a spill. As her foot lifted off the ground, you went with it.

You watch the carpet fly beneath you before getting another face-full, then feel the pressure increase and watch the ground soar yet again. The toes wriggle by your head each time, alternating between crushing pain as you're on the ground to squeezing pressure when in the air. After too long of running after Eliza, the foot stays on the ground. You strain to hear what's going on outside, and you believe you can hear Aunt Cassie saying:
1212.title: Little girl is not so little

choices: A pair of Lydia's shoes
Cassandra
12121.content:
The floor gets far away again as your aunt picks up your cousin. You watch Cassie's legs move back and forth far below you as she carries her youngest to bed. Without the constant smashing against the floor, the sticky substance keeping you stuck to Lydia's foot begins to fail. Afraid of Cassie's massive feet below you, you clutch for your four year old cousin's toes and hold on.

Cassie pushes the door open and sets Lydia on the bed. You extricate yourself from the toes right as your aunt pulls the blankets right up to Lydia's neck, securely tucking her in, and trapping you with her. You run up as far as you can and push against the sheets as the two say goodnight. The lights go off and whatever light that filtered in was gone. Before long, Lydia gets restless and rolls over, right onto you. Smashed between a massive four year old and Dora the Explorer bed linen, you quickly run out of air and pass out.

When you awake, Lydia is gone, and you are alone on the giant bed. A bedside clock reads 9:00 A.M., so you figure Lydia must be up and playing. This would be the best time to go. As nice as Lydia might be, yesterday you spent an hour under her foot, so she was no longer choice one for help. You slid down the sheet and onto the floor, and begin the trek to the door. You weren't half way there when it swings open and Cassie walks in. Instinctively you scream for help, but none comes as her toes smash into your face, knocking you over for her heel to trod on. Unlike Lydia's foot, which smelled like sticky fruit juice, your Aunt foot smelled like body lotion. It lifts off of you and you see her gathering dirty laundry. Not wanting to be left in the room, you grab onto a dirty sock (which does not smell like juice) and hold on. Cassie doesn't see it at first and ends up stepping it and slipping. You and the sock went flying into the air, along with the clothes your Aunt had in her hands, while she went tumbling down, feet in the air. As you fall back down, you see yourself heading towards:
12121.title: Sleep for all

choices: Eliza put on Lydia's shoes! (It's pretty cramped in here!)
Lydia is wearing you! (Ground under a 4 year old!)
121211.content:
If you ever made it out alive, you would be sure to tell people that skydiving to a little girl's footwear is the opposite of a good idea. Landing ass first into a pink fabric flat was not on your schedule for the day. At a little over 6 inches long, you fit into the shoe without any room for movement. You're not sure how, but you've ended up laying on your back, with your head by the toe section and your legs in the open end.

As Cassandra pick herself (and the laundry) back up, you struggled on getting out. Since you couldn't lift your head, you were stuck using your legs to shimmy your way to freedom. This was taking quite a while, and before you knew it, two sets of footsteps entered the room. Your prison was lifted up and gently carried away. Without a window, you were unable to see where you were being taken, but you feared for your life. As the shoe was dropped down, you craned your head to see what was going on.

From the opening, five soft, stubby toes of a kid entered your hell. Your legs were smashed down by them, but you knew it would get worse. You futilely screamed as the rest of the foot was shoved over your body, pressing you into the sole.


"Okay girls! It's time to go to the park. I've got your shoes, now put them on please." Cassandra set down two pairs of pink slip-ons, identical except for size. Without waiting, Eliza rushed forward and shoved her grimy feet into a pair. Lydia puts on the other pair, and the family walks to their SUV, ready for a long day of fun.
121211.title: Shoes in the morning, pain in the afternoon

choices: The playground equipment.
A sandbox.
1212112.content:
"No, wait, Lydi-" you scream, cut off as her foot slams onto your chest. Your whole world quivers as her foot slides forward, toes clutching at you as she jams the footwear on. She stomps her foot to secure it, once, twice, three times, each one driving a scream from between your lips as her soft flesh engulfs you.

She takes a step, her whole foot rolling over you. You wimper, as your head is used as launching pad by the ball of her foot, feeling your skull creak as the four year old stroll towards the SUV. You feel yourself sliding as the step swings forward, and you gasp as your head bumps the front of the shoe just seconds before her foot hits the ground once more. Her toes, usually pudgy and small but now each longer and larger than your arm, immediately wrap around your neck, forcing your head between them. You scream, a harsh wail that echoes in the darkness of the flat, only to be silenced as the next step threw a long, grey strand of old sock lint into your mouth.

Cassie lifts her daughters into their car seats, making sure they're secure before setting herself down in front of the steering wheel and driving out. The park's only a couple minutes away, but she turns on a simple children's song playlist to keep the girls busy anyway. While Eliza watches the world rush by out of the car window, Lydia pulls a couple of dolls out of her backpack and begins to play with them, roughly slamming them into each other. As she gets into it, she begins to swing her feet. You hold on, clutching at imperceptible ridges and folds in the girl's foot, holding on for dear life as you feel the world rush by at dozens of miles per hour, all while her toes continue to probe and batter your head, each soft digit taking its turn to smash your face flat into the insole.

"We're here!" Cassandra announces a few minutes later. The girls squeal in joy, jumping out of the car, Lydia's foot roughly driving you into the sharp gravel below. "Have fun and don't wander too far," their mom says, as they rush off towards...
1212112.title: Taken along

choices: Cass's; a sponge
Lydia's; a bath toy
12122.content:
"Phew! Lydia, you're getting stinky. I think it's bathy-wathy time."

"Noooo!" Lydia, like your usual four year old, was not a big fan of the idea. To be frank, neither were you. It'd be extremely awkward, after all.

Oh, and you'd likely drown and get crushed. That too.

Both your's and Lydia's opinions were promptly ignored, and Cass grabbed her little girl and headed towards the bathroom. Lydia expressed her First Amendment right and began to protest, violently kicking her legs and screaming. You were screaming too, as the girl's kicks shook you back and forth. You could feel the sticky bond holding you to your cousin loosening.

And then it broke. You weren't saved from a watery grave though, as the juice-glue broke on a forward swing of the kick, hurling you into the porcelain death trap of the tub. Your Aunt's massive form leaned over and turned on the faucet, much to your dismay.

Peering over the sheer walls of the tub, you watched as Cass stripped her little girl, who'd seemingly forgotten about her hatred of cleaning and was happily playing with her plastic bath toys.

Cass vanished from the room again, only to reappear with a bottle of friendly looking bubble bath. She dumped the remainder of the bottle over your head. You hadn't expected that, and your eyes got quite their fill of soap. It felt like your very own pupils were bubbling out of your face. So much for tear-free.

The water rose about you, but it was too sudsy and you just couldn't manage to clear out your eyes. Everything was still a blur as you struggled to stay afloat. A massive wave washed over you as Lydia stepped into the other side of the tub.

You hardly could see as _______ hand wrapped around you, ready to unawarely use you as _______.
12122.title: Filling the bath

choices: Cassandra's putting her house loafers on to go play with her daughters
Cassandra is mindlessly playing with her slippers while she is watching tv
122.content:
There was no way in hell you were going to stick your hands into someone's nose on purpose! That's just plain disgusting, and would probably not even work. You instead choose to let go and drop from your precarious perch, hopefully to somewhere you could get noticed at. You take a final look down past the massive maw that had nearly swallowed you, down towards Cassandra's lap. With any luck, this time you would be able to scramble off her lap before ending up in any other drinks.

Plan in mind, you screw your eyes shut and count down. 1... 2... 3... GO! You opened your hands and dropped like a stone. Unfortunately, when you checked your flight path, you forgot to account for your aunt's breasts. Your feet each land on a separate boob and you fall on your butt, straight into her cleavage. You instinctively scream out for help, even though you know you won't get any. Refusing to be humiliated by Cassie any longer, you pull with all your might and manage to free your butt from the all consuming grip of the massive mammaries. Uneasily you get to your feet, constantly shaking on the wobbly flesh of your relative. Right as you finally get the hang of standing you catch your foot on the edge of her shirt and trip backwards. You fall backwards towards the ground, face up as you watch the head of your aunt, a person who used to be about your height, get farther and farther away.

The next thing you know, you're surrounded by a soft fabric with a musky odor. Lifting your aching head up, you find yourself in a cave a little more than twice the length of your body. No, not a cave. You still haven't quite got used to your new size. You shake your head and reassess the situation. Funky smell, plush interior, about twelve inches long... A shoe! You had to be in a shoe! And it was a soft one at that, clearly for use around the house. You puffed up from pride at your detective skills. Nothing gets past you! Except for your Aunt's foot, which was sliding into the shoe behind you. The toes had already knocked you down by the time you noticed, leaving you no opportunities to escape. You pound at the fleshy sole as it overtakes your sky, trying and failing to be noticed, but all too soon the petite foot (Ha!) of your Cassie had completely overtaken you.
122.title: Out of the nose and into the shoe

choices: Run between your aunt and cousins to try for their attention
No one will find you.  Set up a new life among the giants.
1221.content:
Today was Saturday. Like most American children, your cousins Lydia and Eliza were home. Being four and six respectively, the two spent this free day playing with dolls and related accessories. To them, life was good. Life was also enjoyable for Cassandra. After watching "Sex and the City" on DVR, she was feeling pretty happy. For the last half hour she could hear her daughters playing peacefully and felt like she should join them. After all, life's good when you spend time with your kids. She finished her water, turned the TV off and slid her feet into her loafers. Time for some bonding time.

You were also getting some bonding time, just in a different way. Far beneath your aunt's attention, you are lying in her soft shoe, face pressed into her heel. She hadn't taken her first step yet, and you had no idea what would happen. Would her heel crush your head to a pulp, or had the apple made it so you were safe from this pressure? With no options but to take the abuse, you closed your eyes and screamed as she began her step.

Eliza and Lydia were in the neighboring room, so it only took a few steps to get there. Being excitable little girls, they dropped what they were doing and ran up to their mother.
"MomMomMom!!!! Are you going to play with us?"
"Yes I am!" she says as she sits crossed-legged on the floor. "What are we playing?"

As the two went into explanations of the massive dollhouse drama they had set up, you were starting to wake. As soon as her heel hit the ground the first time, your face was compressed between her soft sole and the softer insole. Even with all that plushness, you couldn't take the change in pressure and lost consciousness. Then when her foot stopped pressing you as Cassie sat down, blood returned to your brain and you woke up very quickly. There isn't enough light to see, but you can still feel, and what you feel is that her foot and your former ceiling was now a wall. This gives you an opportunity. If you can curl up into a ball and shove the heel of the shoe off, you can get free from your prison (which is starting to smell).

You act quickly, curling your legs up and bracing your back against her arch. With all your might you push against the insole of the loafer and pray to God that she won't move before you finish slipping it off. God doesn't listen. Before you can even get the foot halfway out of its prison the doorbell rings. Your world shakes as you feel Cassandra move. In your current position, even a single step will be enough to break most of your bones. As the foot swings around, you send one final prayer to the big man: Please God, make it quick.

"I'll get it!" The sound of Eliza's voice comes erupting into the shoe. "Okay. Thank you." The loafer swings back to its former position, and you resume. Although the going was slow and occasional twitches interrupted your progress, you were eventually able to slip the entire shoe off. You hit the ground and the shoe hits next to you. The ground rumbles as your Aunt moves a little, looking down at her foot. She pivots on her ass to where her calf was right above you, and while still playing dolls she begins to grab at the loafer with her slender toes. Awestruck, you watch as her five digits flip the shoe right side up before inserting themselves into it. Her legs then swipe past you, nearly knocking your head off as they fold underneath their owner.

You watch the three women play for a while before what happened really gets to you. Without any help, you were able to move an object twice your size against the will of a woman hundreds of times stronger than you! "I did it. I really did it! Take that world! Life is good! Ha! Ha ha! Ha ha retch." Your fit of joy was interrupted as you spewed out the foot sweat.
1221.title: Life's grand under the sole

choices: Front lobby
Into storytime
12211.content:
Wiping the spit up off your face, you climb to your feet. If you could get noticed, then right now, when the whole family is sitting on the floor, would be the best time. You lean against Cassandra's leg and take in the scene.

It seemed like they were playing with a family of dolls. Eliza, the six year old, was shaking a Barbie around and making it talk about how it loved its job. Cassandra had another Barbie, and she seemed to be taking the role of a coworker. Meanwhile, Lydia, who didn't quite understand the whole concept but loved being part of the group, was alternating smashing her Barbie into the ground, and sucking on its head. With all of this in mind, you decided you should try and get Eliza's attention. Although she was young, she was being less violent than Lydia was and your previous attempts at getting Cassandra's attention all failed.

When Lydia has the doll in her mouth, and Aunt Cassandra has her's pulled away, you sprint up to the little blonde girl held firmly in Eliza's fist. At a foot tall, Barbie was over twice your height. Scaling her like how a lumberjack climbs a tree, you hold onto her plastic head and scream at the top of your lungs.

"ELIZA! I'M DOWN HERE! FOR LOVE'S SAKE, NOTICE YOUR SHRUNKEN COUSIN!"

"And so Barbie said to you, 'I'm tired of all of the puppies that bark so loudly.'"

Before you can even note your disappointment, Lydia reacts to Eliza's comment, yelling, "Bark! Barkbarkbark!" while swinging her doll wildly. It smashes into you, but the spit soaked hair wraps around you and ties you to the plastic woman. "Lydia... LYDIA NO DON'T"

The four year old can't hear you, and she begins her routine again. The doll, with you firmly attached, is smashed into the ground repeatedly. Your face takes quite a beating as the squealing little girl roughly plays with the toy. With a final, face-burning drag across the carpet, you feel the doll lifting steadily up. Through your bruised face, you see the cavern that's about to great you. Her lips part slowly, revealing teeth that haven't fully grown in yet and the tongue that looks hungry for your body. The girl isn't even watching you, with her eyes trained on the doll drama going on between her sister and mom. You scream out a final time as the top of the doll is inserted into her mouth.

Eliza and Lydia only play for another half an hour, but your bruised, beaten body only managed to stay conscious for the first twenty minutes. The massive fleshy tongue is heavily interesting in you, smashing against your face as you hold tightly to the soaking hair of the doll. Lydia sucks violently, causing massive suction that threatens to rip you from your perch and force you down her gullet. However, this was all child's play compared to when she chewed. Her teeth were sharp, and her jaw was strong, so with every bite you skull felt like it was being crushed into paste. She gnawed you with her front teeth, ground you with her molars and crushed you in every way imaginable. By the time you faint, you've felt the worst pain you had ever imagined.



With playtime over, Lydia pulled the Barbie from her mouth and dropped it in the toy box. She and Eliza were getting ready to head to preschool, so she did a quick change and jumped in the car. Upon arriving, she feels... something in the back of her mouth, and stealthily spits onto the short carpet. She didn't know, and probably never would, but the thing she felt was her five-inch tall cousin, who could barely fit in her maw while curled up. The little spit she experienced had launched the poor boy out of her jaw, and into the wild of the daycare. There question is, where?
12211.title: The Human Pacifier

choices: Grown!
Shrunk!
122112.content:
"And so the rabbit took a nap under the tree."

         Vision slowly returned to you. Leaning against a massive blue fabric wall, you attempted to clear your head. What happened, and how'd you get here? All around you are young children who looked to be about Eliza's age. They were all focused on something far above you. You peer up, and jump back in surprise. The massive cloth wall you'd been leaning on was actually the sock of a beautiful daycare worker. She was sitting crossed legged and reading them a story, and you'd been sitting by her feet.

         Suddenly, a sharp pain hits you in the gut. You double over in agony. "What's going on?" Heat begins to emanate from you before a loud pop sounds in your head. You tumble backwards into the sock, and gasp in horror. The foot's size was different! You'd...
122112.title: Storytelling

choices: Christmas eve!
A normal weekday
A normal weekend
1222.content:
You wrench your eyes shut and prepare to be flattened. You know that it's over, that your life is about to end underneath the soft sole of your aunt. But, death sure is taking it's time. And for that matter, being dead sure feels like being tossed up and down...

You reopen your eyes. Cassandra's sole was still merely inches (on your scale) above your head, but it wasn't coming down. In fact, it was going up! Then coming down. Then going up again.

You let out a sigh of relief. It wasn't time for you to die quite yet. You'd let out a laugh, but you didn't want to risk filling your mouth with sweat.

-----------------------------------

Cassandra had a whole day ahead of herself. Her kids were with the ex-husband, and there wasn't anything on her schedule but to kick back and watch some TV. So, she dropped her feet into her most comfortable loafers and began to play with them. This wasn't a conscious plan; her feet just wanted to play.

The TV was playing one of her favorite movies of all time, "Monty Python and the Holy Grail." As she watched, her favorite scene came on.

"What... is your favorite color?" the old man asked Sir Robin.

"Blue. No, wait, green?" Sir Robin's answer wasn't satisfactory, and he was launched into the ravine. Cassandra burst out laughing. How could anyone forget their own favorite color? Her entire body moved with her laughing fit, including her legs.

-----------------------------------

As a plan began to form in your head, the foot stopped bobbing right on top of your head. Worried, you strained to hear the outside world. It wasn't clear, but it sounded like it involved the color green?

With this, your Aunt started her laughing fit. Her legs kicked out, bicycling in the air. The momentum smashed you into her now-vertical foot. The shoe was flung far away as her toes stretched out, and it it wasn't for your death grip on her heel, you feared the same would happen to you. Her feet continued to swing, this time left and right as her fit started to die down. With less momentum, it was harder to hold on to her white flesh, and before she was still again, you fell off, straight to the ground. You hit the blue carpet and rolled under the couch. From here, you watched as her feet settled back onto the ground, and she continued to watch the movie. It seemed like luck was on your side, since death didn't greet you after such a forceful event.

You took this as a moment to rest. Although you've only been five inches for less than fifteen minutes, it had already drained you of energy. So, you took a nap, not waking up until the following morning. What day is it?
1222.title: Comedy hour

choices: Stay with Kelsey!  Head to the desk/bed
Find help elsewhere!  Head to the door/backpack
13.content:
"Kelsey?" You may never know why you ended up here, but you should consider it a godsend. Kelsey was not a mean girl. In fact she was unusually kind, which made her the perfect person to try and get help from. First and foremost, you'd need to get off her legs. Her dress was long, so you end up using it to slide to the ground, landing safely. You peer back up and gaze in awe at the colossal legs high in the air above you. It's a while before you can tear your eyes away and get to work.

With your mind back on the task at hand, you're able peek around the room and start brainstorming. It appeared to you that you were in her bedroom, with a desk and bed in the room's corner away from the TV. Her door was situated next to the TV, and her backpack was placed next to it. The carpet wasn't too thick, barely passing your ankles, and you could see Kelsey was a clean person, with her soccer gear (Yep. She was an athlete.) placed next to her closet, all neatly folded. With the room all mapped out, you could make your move.

One plan could be the side of the room with the bed and the desk. From there, you could try again to get her attention when she was sleeping, or you could find a way to write a message with the equipment in her desk. Of course, these plans rely on Kelsey to find you. It was possible there was someone more suited to assisting you, and for that you'd head to the other side, near the door and pack. From there, you could either jump into the bag and hitch a ride back to your school with the assumption someone there would be helpful, or you could slip through the slightly ajar doorway to... somewhere. To be completely honest, you didn't know too much about Kelsey's family or house. You vaguely remember talk about a younger brother and a younger sister. Maybe they could help. Either way, a plan had to be enacted before long, or something bad might happen.
13.title: Teenage Drama

choices: Insole of her soccer shoe
Chair of her desk
131.content:
Kelsey would be the best plan of action. Leaving her room would add too many variables to the equation, and she had always helped people who needed it. At this point, you needed help more than anyone else.

With this in mind, you went over to her light blue sheets and began to scale them. It wasn't as easy as it might seem. At five inches, you could not use the stitches of the fabric as hand holds, and instead had to gather up a clump of the sheets and push up with your feet. After nearly an hour, you were about half way up and out of breath. As you contemplated letting go, the loud thump of footsteps began to ring out. You peered over your shoulder and got a mid-calf view of Kelsey's finely shaped legs. Completely forgetting your exhaustion, you stare dumbstruck as your titanic friend begins to remove her clothes. Your mouth drops as her skirt does, and your mind flies as she tosses her shirt into a hamper. Her underwear mesmerizes you, with both panties and bra far above. You don't realize what's happening until she starts to put on some soft looking pajamas. Then the enormity hits you: She going to bed.

You scramble to climb down as fast as possible, but you spent too much time staring. She roughly pulls her sheet up to get into bed, forcing you into the air. You smash into a ceiling fan to be knocked out and sent flying. Although you aren't aware of it, your body lands on a nice, soft surface where tomorrow you will learn all about pain.
131.title: Through the air

choices: She remembers she didn't put socks on
Lucky you! A day under your friends smelly bare foot, while she plays soccer.
1311.content: As you land, you feel yourself go splat. However, you are still alive...? Unsure of how this could be, you begin to try and peel yourself off of the sole of the shoe. But just then, the smell hits you and you pass out immediately. In the morning, you wake up to Kelsey's bare foot slipping in on top of your face.
1311.title: Insole of her soccer shoe

choices: She vaguely feels an inch and decides to check.  She likely won't see you...
Nope.  She can't tell what you did.  Good luck in the game!
13112.content:
You open your mouth to scream, only to have it filled with Kelsey's flesh. Her foot was down on you, pressing down hard. How was it that she couldn't feel you?

You certainly could feel her. If you weren't in such pain, you might be impressed by how tiny you were. The ball of her foot was over your head, and yet your feet couldn't quite reach her heel. Hardly half the size of her foot, you were. Humiliating.

Hardly a fraction of a second went by from her foot pressing down to her walking away, but in that time frame you were able to get a good feel for your surroundings. Most obviously, it was impossible to move. If you weren't claustrophobic before, you certainly were now. The "ceiling" wasn't just on top of you; it molded around you. The cold, clammy flesh had give to it, allowing you to sink in a bit. The flesh smelt faint, like she washed it, but only enough to keep it clean. Of course, the odor might be from the shoe and not the foot, but everything was too close and personal to tell.

With that, your thinking time was up. Her foot swung forward, g-forces pulling you out of the foot and into the insole. Then just as quickly it swung back down, the giant mass rushing to meet you once more. This went on, alternating from terrifying acceleration to crushing agony. The flesh was still cool, but soon it'd be heating up and sweating, making this even harder than before.

Eventually, this came to a stop. She must be sitting in her mom's car, getting driven to the game. Another up swing came, pushing you down into the insole. It was stronger than before, and you braced for the impact.

No impact came. Instead, you got the feeling the shoe was in the air. Did she cross her legs? Without warning, the entire prison began bobbing up and down. She was shaking her foot, and you were being shook along with it.

How was it possible you hadn't been felt yet? You weren't some pebble or piece of lint; you were a goddamned person! If you were going to get her to notice you, before the game would be best. No need to experience the life of a soccer player from down below.

Another dilemma: How were you going to do it? Your arms and legs were immobile, so kicking and punching were out. All you could move was your head side to side... and your jaw. Grimacing, you knew what you had to do. Opening wide, you bit down.

Even at sixteen, her skin down here was thick and strong. The first bite didn't so anything, and neither did the second or third. But the skin was beginning to weaken, and on the fifth bite, you chomped down as hard as you could. Finally, the skin tore just ever so slightly. Blood dribbled into your mouth, replacing the taste of old sweat with that of copper. She had to feel you now.

Right?
13112.title: Flat as could be

choices: Amazing! You've become insole boy, and you are stuck to the sole of her shoe.
You were right, the sweat has made you stick.
131122.content:
The coppery tang hit your taste buds, and you thought you'd be free. However, with your mouth agape, it managed to suck in the blood bleeding from her foot. Not much came, and as such, she didn't feel it.

Debating in your head what to do, you felt the gravity shift once again. She wasn't walking... She was running.

Looking forward to the big game, she was in a hurry to rush out of the car and get started. Little did she know that she was running around on top of somebody. However, she did note that her shoe felt slightly more comfortable than usual.

You no longer could do anything as her foot pummeled your face. The once cold and clammy skin began to sweat and heat up, and the familiar taste of foot sweat entered your mouth once more. All you could do was wait until the game was over, knowing very well you'll probably stick to her foot...
131122.title: Nope.  She can't tell what you did.  Good l...

choices: She doesn't notice you, and you slide.
She notices you, and she makes you her slave.
1311222.content: The sweaty sole of your friend becomes your world during the game. Something inside you makes you begin to accept it, and you lick your friend's sole. You spend the whole game doing so, until she sits down in the locker room.
1311222.title: You were right, the sweat has made you stick.

choices: You were outside the shoe
Your friend was offering the other girls to try her shoes on
Reader's choice
13112221.content:
After a while, you feel your friend begin to stop moving and let some of her weight off of you.
