You try to climb the sandal to see if you really can't be seen but suddenly the bus is coming to a stop, knocking you over, and picking up more kids and for school. Since you were not paying attention then the shadow of a foot looms over your minuscule form. Oh no, she's putting her flip flops back on! You try to run, but no dice; the 5 digits cover you. You can't move. What to do now?
1321111.title: The Sandals

choices: Remove the flat
Climb the leg
13212.content:
You sit up and take in your surroundings. It was clear you were in a classroom, so at least you have that goal accomplished. But now what? Moving across the thin blue carpeting that all classes had in your school, you try to find a suitable target for your attention. The desks tower over your minuscule form, blocking any hope of seeing faces and forcing you to decide by feet alone.

After an entire minute of deliberation, you decided to just grab the nearest leg and climb. Sitting right behind Kelsey were two beautiful feet encased in black leather flats, crossed at the ankles and perfectly still. These would make the perfect target. You get as close as you can, and begin your test. First, hit the flesh and see if she notices. You wind up and...

"Ouch! Dammit!" You nearly break your hand on her foot, but see still hasn't noticed. So far, so good. Next, you have some options. From the backpack adventure, you learned that you can definitely interact with inanimate objects, so you could try to take her shoe off. It would be indirect and would get her attention, so it was worth a try. Of course, if you were tired of feet and didn't want to see her slender, wriggling toes out of their prison, you could just climb her leg. She was wearing a pair of denim jeans that would be easy to climb, and would give you a better vantage point on her lap.

Well, what can a person do?
13212.title: Fisticuffs

choices: You escape the shoe before she gets bored.
You take too long, and she puts the shoe on the rest of the way.
132122.content:
"And so our brave hero begins his climb of the treacherous Mt. Leg." You chuckle as you begin your climb. Finding the climb easier than expected, you pass the time with little stories like this. Within a few more minutes, the action hero has reached the summit. Looking further up, it appears the rest of this girl would be a tough climb, since she's wearing a skimpy little top. So instead, you admire the view. All around you are other girls, dress in all sorts of clothes and with all sorts of appearances. To be completely truthful to yourself, this wasn't so bad.

You ended up spending a little too much time taking in the sights, as the lap you were riding begins to shift. You try and maintain your balance, but it's too much as she crosses her legs. You plummet to the ground, and before you hit you see her flats. She had taken her feet out! You smack into the damp sole and groan. You clamber to your knees, but are immediately pushed back down as lightly tanned toes crashed into the shoe.

Your mind goes right to the worst situation, and you fear that she's putting the shoe on. You clench your eyes closed and scream, only to be shaken instead of crushed. You open you eyes, and right above you is her sole coming straight down. Then it moves back up. She's not putting her shoe on - She's playing with it. You let out a laugh as the smooth sky moves closer again. It's time for you to move.
132122.title: Shoeplay

choices: You manage to hold on.
You lose your grip.
1321221.content:
There was no time to take in the sights. Of course, by sights you meant the slightly pink sole of the teenage girl whose shoe you currently resided in, but your point still stands. As her foot lifts away from the insole, you crouch like a tiger, ready to pounce for your freedom.

Apparently, the girl didn't get the memo. She dropped the shoe to the ground, knocking you into the sweaty floor. Her foot dives down and smashes toe first into the footwear. You are shaken out, and watch as she doesn't put the shoe on, but instead leaves her foot vertical as she grinds and kneads her toes up and down the bottom of the shoe. You dread to imagine what would have happened if you didn't manage to get knocked out. Remember, even though her foot is only twice your size, it has plenty of force left to tear you a new asshole.

With that near death experience fresh in your mind, you needed to decide on a new plan. You could always try and get someone's attention, but it might not be such a good plan from down here on the floor. Instead, maybe try to climb a desk? Or, since you needed a bit of a breather after that life-flashing-before-my-eyes moment, this could be the perfect time to explore.

And of course, your teenage mind goes straight to exploring the girl's locker room. That decided it. Lustful thoughts filled your mind as you strolled to the door. Scantly clad chicks and bouncing breasts filled your mind, distracting you from your surroundings. Had your mind not been preoccupied with that one girl in your math class, then maybe you would have noticed students packing up. Maybe not, but it could have helped what happened next.

Briiiiing

The bell to end the period. Snapping back to realty, you watched in horror as thirty monolithic high school students rose from their seats and began to march towards the door. The very same door you were standing in front of...

Feet start to pound closer and closer. You dodge the first few, but a converse swipes the back of your head and go go flying. Your arms reach out, looking for something, for anything to hold on to so you don't become a stain on the bottom of a sophomore's foot. It was so unlikely for you to succeed, but you did. Your arm locked underneath the middle toe of a preppy girl's designer sandals as her foot lifted for a step. The force swung you against the main part of her foot, and as her step finished, you had time to secure both arms between her toes.

Yet another reminder of how insignificant you are: With your arms wrapped around her toes and your head up to the bottom of the purple toenails, your feet couldn't make it to her ankle. There wasn't much of a choice for you, so you held on. Each of her steps tried to toss you off, and the motion was constant. You couldn't see anything but vague flesh tones, since the world soared by too quickly. Occasionally she wiggled her toes and squeezed your arms, nearly pulling them off or breaking them in half. As you buried your face between the third and fourth digits of the left foot of a girl who didn't know you existed, you couldn't help but wonder if you could actually hold on until she stopped moving.
1321221.title: This ain't my first rodeo

choices: Hitch a ride with one of the babes.
Leave once the room has emptied.
13212211.content:
Through the power of sheer will, you keep your arms tucked under the titanesses slender toes for the entire trip. It wasn't easy for you; on the contrary, it was probably the hardest thing you've ever done. Every up swing pushed your body into the flesh, and every time the foot came down, the force shook you to the core. Even with your eyes screwed shut, you could feel the foot moving in subtle ways that could never be noticed from a normal perspective.

Anyways, you survived the ordeal. Her foot slows down and you wrench open your eyes. Two things are immediately evident, even with your shaken mind: You are in front of a line of lockers, and there are girls all around you in various states of undress. You made it to the girl's locker room. Score.

You pervert.

Sexy thoughts were abruptly cut off as the foot was lifted onto a bench. It wasn't hard to guess why; these sandals were hardly fit for exercise. You peel your arms from the death grip you had, and push off the golden skin. You make the bench, right as manicured fingers start grabbing at the straps.

Enough of that chick, it's time for some action. You walk along the bench, seeing if you could spot anyone you know. Maybe you could find someone who could help you after you had your fill of sexy-fun-time.

Not a single familiar face. Of course, it might just be that your eyes were focused... further down south, but the point still stands. You couldn't find anyone familiar. So, while you take your fill of breasts that rivaled the size of trucks, you decided on a plan. Since staying in the locker room after hours wasn't going to cut it, you'd:
13212211.title: Strip tease

13212212.content:
You tried your best, you really did, but the swinging foot was too much for your twig-arms. You let go and were sent tumbling down as the girl kept walking. All around the hallway, massive feet pounded the ground on their way to the next class, unaware and uncaring about your predicament. You needed to move before it was...

Too late. A red converse high top swiped you roughly to the side, knocking the breath out of you. Unable to move, dodging the footsteps just became impossible. The next foot, a black Toms slip-on, crushed your ribs as it's wearer skipped along her way. A fancy peep-toe pump came next, and the spiked heel was driven through your leg. You femur shattered as the shoe lifted back up.

Blood comes up as you cough. "Shit." You wish it wasn't over, but in your heart, you could tell that you weren't gonna make it out of this one. As the shadow of a floral print rubber boot forms over your limp body, you can't help but feel a little disappointed. You've been shrunk for maybe 3 hours, and you're already dead? How pathetic is that?

The boot's sole is enough to cover your entire little form. The mud speckled treads finish the job the other girls started. Most of your body is ground into the hallway floor, where it'll be cleaned up by a janitor a little later.





Way to waste a magic apple.
13212212.title: Lost my grip!

choices: She notices something in between her toes, and slips her foot out to check.
Living inside toe jam stinks! Literally!
1321222.content:
Laughing to yourself, you take a breather. But just as you relax, her foot actually does come down. You can only stare at it like a deer stares at oncoming headlights. And wham! It pushes you to the toe of the shoe.

After a moment of being blacked out, you see her toes wiggle in the rest of the way. You end up in between her toes, and you're immediately caught in some toe jam. The smell is absolutely awful.

As it would turn out, this girl and her best friend were having a bet. They were seeing who could go the longest without washing their feet. No matter what happens. So far, it has been two weeks, and she is still going strong.
1321222.title: You take too long, and she puts the shoe on the...

choices: Crawl under the closed door
Jog over to the open door
Too late!  Something happens to you!
1322.content:
The hallway goes quiet as the siblings stomp away. You slip through the open door, and behold a endless field of pink carpet stretched before you. Not wanting a repeat performance of the squishing, you sidle up to the walk next to the door and begin to creep up to the door on your left. It's not open, so you'll need to slide under it. While that shouldn't be too much off a problem, if someone decides to use the door, you're going to become a part of the carpet.

You decide to file this door away. Peering across the expanse of flooring, you spot another door on the other side of the hall. It's ajar enough to let you in, but there's the problem of the mile of carpet you'd have to trek across to get there. That's plenty of time for someone to walk through and trod on your sorry ass.

Both doors present a problem, and you're not sure what's behind either of them. The only way to find out is to pick one. And you'd best hurry, because something's bound to happen if you don't.
1322.title: The hallway of options...

choices: Screw the consequences; kill the toys!
Let's find another distraction.
13221.content:
The journey across the hallway would be too dangerous. Anyone could walk across and stomp on you. Therefore, the only sensible option was to go under the door.

The door itself was rather plain and uninteresting. It was painted a faded blue and the paint was chipping along the bottom. You get down to your stomach and take a deep breath. If you want to do this right, you'll need to do it fast.

You know those clips of WWII training camps where recruits crawl through mud underneath barbed wire? Imagine that, but with thick carpeting instead of mud and sharp paint chips instead of barbed wire. Clothes were torn and flesh was ripped apart as you pushed your way under the door.

Eventually, you make it to the other side. Standing up, you stumble onto a rather large piece of green plastic. It was a little green man, about half your height and dressed in plastic army fatigues of the same color. A little plastic army man!

Setting it back upright, you realize he wasn't alone. You were standing in a field of little plastic army men. A veritable army of toys. You guessed this was the room of that seven year old who trampled you earlier.

Examining the army, you could see how meticulously set up this was. Soldiers were grouped in platoons, all facing towards another army of tan soldiers not too far ahead. It was clear the boy was a big fan of the military.

While admiring the army, a nasty thought came into your head. If you knocked the whole army down, you could get revenge for the trampling you were given earlier. Of course, that'd take time, and the poor boy didn't know he crushed you.

Whatever. It was time for revenge. You moved to a nearby rifleman, and shoved him. Despite him being half your size, the little plastic man put up quite a fight before falling down. This might take more time than you imagined, and who knows how long it'll be before the little kid gets back.. Maybe it's time to look for something else.
13221.title: War is hell.

choices: Fuck it, let's stay.
Fuck it, let's go.
132212.content:
Your life is literally at risk of being stomped out, and you wanted to waste time playing with toys? Jesus help you.

The room at large was a typical boy's room. Blue carpet on the floor, blue sheets on the bed, blue paint on the walls. It did have a bit of a military theme going on; specifically US Army. Maybe his dad was deployed overseas? Regardless, the floor beyond the soldiers was cluttered with all sorts of army paraphernalia: military books, plastic rifles, even a little (well, big to you) uniform he could wear.

And, to your chagrin, nothing stood out to you as a way of getting his attention. Did you even want his attention? Was coming into this room nothing but a big mistake?

You turn around and ponder the door. Are you going to risk crawling back under the door? Your back was still bleeding from the first trip in here. Maybe you could wait for him to enter, and work from there.
132212.title: Waste of time

choices: Feels something strange...
Nothing's wrong, no change for a while
1322121.content: Too late! Before you can decide, the gargantuan 7 year old comes waltzing inside, with a cup of juice in hand. He makes his way towards a small table and chair, directly in your line of view. You attempted to jump aside, hoping there was enough time but you accidentally wound up running face first into a toy soldier that now lay on its back. You backed away, but the sound of his fallen toy caught his attention. Just when you thought you were discovered, he continued stomping forward until his left sole hung directly above you. Before you could react, his elongated toes *thoomed* over your entire body, covering your miniscule form with every thick wrinkle. The heavy ball was like a cheesy meteor, collapsing onto and simultaneously crushing your frame into the carpeted floor below, before the rest of his foot covered and silenced your existence. He then twisted his foot left, dragging the entirety of his form with him, followed by twisting to the right, seemingly looking for the sound of his fallen toy soldier. The boy finally looked directly down, noticing now half of a soldier sticking out from under his other foot and giggled. The Child picked it up with two toes and dropped it among a pile of soldier carcasses before stomping away and back towards his table. With each step and *thoom* however, you were taken along underneath him!
1322121.title: Fuck it, let's stay.

choices: Kiddy chair! Uh oh.
Table! A chance at last!!
13221211.content: Suddenly, he felt a pinch beneath one of his feet. "Oww!" His foot thrust into the air, freeing you from your harsh smelly confine and onto a hard surface. Where were you?
13221211.title: Feels something strange...

choices: Get comfy, this'll be a while!
Gets up...chance at freedom?
132212111.content:
In front of the boy lay a broken toy soldier, unable to withstand the weight of his barefoot, unlike you. He angrily kicked it far and out of sight before walking back towards the table, with his juice in tow. Meanwhile, due to the impact of his heel(soldier's gun luckily stabbed the child between your legs, barely missing contact with you!) Thrusting into the air, you slammed face first into a small green and blue platform. Dazed, you flipped onto your back, so you could catch your breath while shutting your eyes to the bright room light above. No more than 3 seconds of rest pass, when once more: *thoom* *thoom* *THOOM* Heavy stomping and a deeply large shadow overtook your view. You squinted your eyes open, now that the bright light was blocked by a dark figure, only to see the shadow swiftly lift into the air. The outline shook your entire soul with fear as you realized what this sighting was. Before you, the massive 7 year old you aimed to grab attention from, was not only attempting to sit down on top of you, but was about to do so, by jumping.

You then put the pieces together and figured out what your flooring truly was. It, was the chair he originally marked as his destination, and he no longer held his juice cup, meaning it was resting on the table next to you. All of this was processed with the last remaining seconds of freedom you had left, before your screams became muffled by a loud, earth shattering ground pound, butt first, directly onto you.
132212111.title: Kiddy chair! Uh oh.

choices: To the closet!
The the bathroom!
13223.content:
From down the hall, you hear a loud continuous roar. You squint, trying your hardest to make out the source. There, turning the corner into the walkway is woman, maybe thirty, pushing a massive vacuum cleaner. And she's heading right towards you.

See, this is why you listen when the narrator says to hurry.

Forgetting any sense of danger from the doors, you start to run away from the machine. It bellows, sounding more like a hell-hound than a Hoover. There was no time for thinking, no time for rational thought. You simply ran along the pink carpet, casting occasional glances back to the woman and her beast. She was catching up, and you were running out of steam. At the end of the hallway, there was a single closed door. It was thin and had a tall opening at the bottom, likely belonging to a storage closet. If you could make it...

But, oh no! The plot demands drama, not success! Despite your best efforts, your ankle gets caught in the carpet fibers and you go down. "Shitshitshitshitshit," you say as you try to pull free from the threads. The machine was still approaching; you could feel the suction tugging you, pulling you in.

Slam! The door to your left slams open, and a barely clothed Kelsey walks out. A bathroom, perhaps? "Mom, we're out of clean towels." The vacuum stops as the mother and daughter chat. Seeing your chance, you pull free from the tangle and dash towards the door. But, which one?
13223.title: Run, run as fast as you can.

choices: You get out and explore
Ms. B's not done jogging yet!
14.content:
"Ms. B? Good. She likes me." Of all of your teachers this year, you feel like she appreciates you the most, which means she would definitely help you if you got her attention. But how to do that?

Before you get any time to plot, the woman you are standing begins to stand. Fearful of falling, you hook your arms into her belt loops and hold on. You watch in unbridled fear as she grabs a pair of socks, slips on her red sneakers and leaves her house for a jog. Every step she takes, you are not only forced to watch legs as tall as skyscrapers swing beneath you, but your face is also shoved into her zipper which soon begins to slowly slide down. After an indeterminate amount of time, you hear from above, "Excuse miss, but your fly seems to be undone." With a view that only shows you a straight down perspective, you watch as the legs slowly stop, and from right above you hear your teacher exclaim, "Oh God! Thank you so much!" You crane your neck as far as possible and see two fingers reach down towards you.

"Ms. B! I'm right here! No!" Her pointer finger and thumb grab for the zipper, which is right by your waist, and end up being knocked off your belt loops. Frightened of falling and being stranded, you wrap yourself around her thumb as she finishes pulling her zipper up. She calls a thanks to the stranger, then resumes her jog. This was painful for you, because she jogged with her hands in a tight fist, leaving you unable to move and being swung through the air faster than you've ever moved. It doesn't take long for vertigo and nausea to cause you to faint.

When you wake, you are still stuck in her fist, but the environment has changed. It appears she is sitting down, taking off her shoes. Still tightly wrapped around her thumb, you are greeted with a face full of sweaty flesh and smelly sock as she shoves her thumb (and you) between her foot and shoe, using you a leverage to slip out. The overall effect of the smell, pressure and the fact you just woke up lead to you dropping off her thumb and rolling down the sole of her foot as she removes it, landing face first in a puddle of sweat in the bottom of the shoe. You climb to your knees and look over the edge of the shoe. At five inches, you can easily get over the side of the shoe. You walk to the nearest edge and...
14.title: Hanging from the crotch

choices: I'm near the door!
This garden is a maze and I'm lost!
141.content:
Taking a moment to recover from your near death experiences, you sit on a large 11 painted on the insole. You almost died from falling, from being crushed and from being squeezed, and not a soul knew. You had to do something, and it had to be quick. Next time, you might not be as lucky and could end up falling off the belt loop or being squished by the thumb. If direct contact failed, it could be possible to write out a message. You know you can move things since your face unzipped Ms. B's pants, so if you could find some paper and a bit of pencil lead, you could get some help!

With a new plan in mind, you vault over the wall of the shoe and find yourself in a wide open area. Across the room lay two doors, one to the left and one straight ahead. You can't remember which way your teacher went, so it'll be down to guesswork. The door behind you that you came from probably leads outside, and there are various sneakers and shoes to confirm it. Right across the hall, the door has an animal flap to let a pet in, but so does the left door. One final observation is that the far door has boots and shoes next to it, while the left one has a welcome mat. It seems likely the far door leads to a back yard whilst the left one leads back inside.

You turn towards the left door and begin your march, when all of a sudden the pet flap opens and a small (to a normal person) cocker spaniel marches out. Not waiting to find out if it can see you, you run to the nearest door, which happens to be the third one. It is slightly ajar, and you take advantage of this, slipping through and running out. The area appears to be a back garden, but being scared of the massive beast of a dog, you jog through the plants without paying attention to anything. You don't stop until you run smack dab into a green plastic wall. Looking up reveals Ms. B holding a hose, watering her plants. She steps back, right over your head, giving you a short view of the mud encrusted bottom of her rubber boot. Her feet land behind as she keeps stepping back, spraying more and more of the ground with water. For the first time since you ran into her boot, you take your eyes off her and look at what's happening. The water is soaking into the soil, helping the plants grow and turning the ground into a tsunami of mud rushing right towards you. Wasting no more time, you turn towards the teacher and run. With you already winded from running from the dog, there is no chance of you escaping the mud flow. You grab a rose sticking up, and climb it up to the top. Safe from the mud and with a new perspective, you look around and see where you are.
141.title: Green Thumb

choices: About to step on you with her rubber boot!
About to dig a hole to plant a flower on you!
1412.content:
All you could behold from your flowery perch was more flowers. Bushes of roses, azaleas, tulips and daises obscured your view, and left you with no idea of how to get out of the massive garden. In fact, you could barely see Ms. B crouching behind a rhododendron bush. You could see the ground, and within a few minutes, it was solid enough to walk through again. You climbed down and jumped into the mud.

You started your trek through the damp, squishy ground. The going was rough, but you didn't run into many problems. Soon, you got near your giant teacher. It looked like she was planting a camellia. As you got even closer, the ground got looser, and your foot sunk in to your knee. You pulled against the mud, but it wouldn't budge. Using your hands like a trowel, you began to scoop the ground away from your feet. Before you were even half way free, a shadow was cast over you. Looking up, you see a horrifying sight and scream. Ms. B is:
1412.title: Quicksoil

choices: A neighbor kid accidentally kicks a soccer ball into the garden.
Ms. B is coming back.
14121.content:
They say that one's life flashes before their eyes when they're about to die. You're supposed to remember the good, forgive the bad, and find a sense of closure before the end. And, to be fair, maybe that is what happens when you fall from a plane or are bleeding out from being shot. But when an unaware giantess is about to plant her rubber boot firmly on you? There simply isn't the time.

The boot pushed you down as Ms. B stepped back. The mud was surprisingly forgiving; the sole was not. It felt like an unstoppable force was trying to make a mud pie out of you. She stood on top of you, casually watering her plants.

She lightly tapped her foot, threatening to knock your teeth out. Even through the thick rubber, you could feel the power contained in her foot. It only took a single step and some unconscious taps to bury you in the soil.

Finished watering, she stepped off and walked away. You spit mud out, and realize the ground is much closer than it was before. Did you shrink? No, that wasn't it. You were simply pushed into the ground all the way up to your neck. The mud had compacted into a sort of tomb, keeping you from moving anything but your head. You are stuck.
14121.title: Planted

choices: She picks the ball up (Whew....)
She kicks the ball (Oh CRAP!!!!!!!!!!!)
141211.content:
With your entire body buried in the dirt, you couldn't help but feel more vulnerable than ever. You highly doubt anyone will believe in your terrifying experience as a mite the next time you tell your stories to them. You don't know how long you been in this state. Five? Ten? or even Thirty minutes? Who knows, you might as well just live as a plant, getting water from rain or having a bunch of worms nipping on your feet. "Oh yeah...what a life this is." you said sarcastically.

Suddenly, you began to hear a sound from a far distance. It was faint but it you could make it out. You listen carefully and soon you start hearing what sounded like a bunch of young neighbor kids. They sound like they're playing around with each other. This was soon followed by the sound of kicking and there, just in five seconds, a massive (and fortunately) object lands right on your face. Crap, you can't see anything anymore.

"Hey Karen, can you go get for the ball for us?" you heard one of the children said.

"Sure can do"

A light bulb sports out of your head and thought: "Perfect, I can just grab on to this ball and wait until this 'Karen' girl to come pick it up!" With all your might, you tried your best to reach your mouth to the ball. This took HUGE effort but you manage to bite on to the edge of one of the pentagon-shaped spots. Everything is all according to plan.

A second thought popped out of your head: what if she decided to kick the ball instead of picking it up? It may help get out of this mess quicker, but you'll end up joining those kids in their little game of soccer...and doesn't sound like a good thing.

It already too late to go back because the entire ground began to shake from the young girl's footsteps. You can just sit there and pray that she doesn't kick it.
141211.title: The Escape Plan

choices: The game is still going on, and you're still in the middle!
The girls have left, and you're all by yourself
1412112.content:
Your hopes are dashed as the girl's kick sends the ball, and you, rocketing through the air. With a painful clack, your teeth slip off the damp synthetic rubber and you're sent into a tumble, the world rushing by in a blur of colors.

Thump.

The ball lands in the grass, and you slam into the soil just feet from where it comes to a rest. "Thanks a lot, Karen," you moan, trying to ignore the feelings of dread as an imposing tween girl strolls through the grass towards the ball. Her bright orange cleat slams down by your head, as she rests the other on top of the ball.

"Thanks a lot, Karen!" she says, smiling brightly.

You lean against the girl's leg, resting your panting head against her ankle sock. They won't start until Karen's back, so I've got a few minutes. There're four kids by your count, including your wonderful kicker; not a full game, so this shouldn't be too intense. They're all young girls, anyway, none older than maybe thirteen, so how rough can it -

"Ready go!" shouts the girl above you as she jerks to life. Her shifting leg bucks you off, and your shocked form slams into her laces as her foot soars forward, pancaking you for just a moment between ball and shoe before you bounce free, rolling into the grass. You act, quickly spitting out the clumps of mud and scrambling to your feet but from behind you crashes the footsteps of the shortest girl of the bunch.

"Not fair! Megan! Karen just got back!" she laughs. You're having a lot less fun as the smooth sole of her ratty sneaker soars down onto you. Her step is hard, pushing down into the damp soil, the weight of the girl unforgiving as she chases her friend. When her foot lifts your screaming form, still muddy and gunky from the garden, sticks to it, and you shout your way through the arc of her step until she slams back down, filling your mouth with grass and dirt. Her step leaves you this time, a discarded doll broken in the yard.

The ball is caught up in between the four of them, their kicks tearing up the poor yard as they fight over the ball, before finally a lucky kick sends it careening away - - right towards you. Oh no, you think, diving flat to avoid the ball. A glance through the towers of grass shows the four girls, all smiles and giggles, now turning towards you, their massive steps churning the earth beneath them.

"Girls, girls, no no stop!" you shout, as they're on you. Megan and Karen are neck and neck, and so Megan's orange and Karen's blue cleats find you first, their spikes tearing gashes into your skin as the trod over you, their swinging steps propelling you forward with them, holding you as a mobile hostage, trodding on you just to fling you forward for the next to step down. You wail, as Megan's heel grabs a hold, your head jammed in a clod of mud stuck to her shoe, ragdolling you as she finally catches up with the ball. She kicks it, passing it towards the taller of the other two, shouting "Go for the goal Soph!" She stood, rooted in one place in awe as she watched her friend make the shot, unaware that you were beneath her.

14212121.content:
Your feet padded lightly across the cool tile. The kitchen was disappointingly plain; fridge, cabinets, sink, oven, it had the whole set, but there was nothing odd or out of place. The idea that your teacher was hiding an adventure was starting to seem unlikely.

Crunch

A crumb, small enough for even you to trod on. It wasn't alone, either; a trail of similar crumbs led off into that dark room beyond. Probably nothing, but what if it was the lead you've been searching for?

You jog along the trail, your mind racing with possibilities. Was Ms. B really just a messy eater, or was there something more? Perhaps an animal was breaking into her kitchen, and you could be the tiny exterminator she's been in need of! Or maybe it was a group of other tiny people like you, who've been collecting food for their hidden colony? Or it might be some other magic happening that your newly awakened mind just can't comprehend! You speed up, and cross into the dark room beyond. After a couple of seconds, your eyes adjust to the dimness, and you discover...

An ordinary dining room. The trail of crumbs leads towards a table, on which a covered chocolate cake sat. Grabbing a crumb, you gave it a sniff.

"Cake," you say to the empty room. "So, the answer is that she's a messy eater?" You drop the crumb to the floor. "I'm hungry, but not that hungry."

The room responds with a low growl. You freeze.

"H-hello?" you say, your voice shaking. Again, a growl, louder this time. It seemed to be coming from the far end of the room, just beyond the table and out of sight.

Everything about this said to turn around and leave, to find a different room to explore. You wanted adventure, not death. Yet, here was the void, growling right at you, an adventure like no other. You had to check it out.

Slowly and with caution, you crept towards the table. Pushing past the tablecloth, you creep beneath it. The growling had faded to a low rumble of heavy breaths. You drop to the ground, completely uncertain in your invisibility. Peaking past the cloth, you find before you a massive dog, curled up in a ball in a soft blue dog bed.

You laugh, standing to your feet. "Aww, what a cute little doggo. And to think I was worried."

Quicker than you thought possible, the dog's head swiveled around and stared right at you.

"Uhh, can you see me?"

The dog began to stand, its shaggy form towering high in the air. Its eyes never left you, its mouth open and starting to drool. It took a step towards you, tail wagging gently.

"Damn it," you shout, and turn to run. The dog's follows close behind. You make it to the kitchen with the dog just inches away from your neck. It slips on the tiles and slams into a cabinet, which swings open as pots and pans fall out. It barks out, but before it finds its footing you're out of the room.

In the living room, you quickly look for a hiding spot. Under the couch? No, it'd have no trouble grabbing you there. On the coffee table? It'd be here long before you summited that peak. In the tv stand? The doors were firmly shut, and you weren't getting those open. That left...

Your face turned pale as you stared at the overturned oxfords. They were a light brown casual pair, something she could wear out on a day in the town, and by the wear and tear it looked like that was something she'd done quite a few times. You'd had enough of shoes for a lifetime today, yet...

It wasn't likely the dog would chew up its owner's shoes just to get at you. And it wasn't like you had any other options. With a grimace, you rushed over to the shoe and tucked yourself in. It was uncomfortably warm and ever so slightly damp, but it was preferable to becoming a chew toy.

The dog, having finally recovered in the kitchen, charged forth into the room. You watched as it looked about, then began to sniff. Nose to the ground, it began to follow your steps, and in moments it stood over the shoe. You curled up in the far end of the shoe, watching the dog weigh its options.

It stood up to its full height and began to bark down at you. "Bark! Bark! Bark!" At this distance it was deafening. You felt it bat the shoe with its snout, barking the whole time. It wanted you, and it wanted you bad. It was only a matter of time before it got its way. You just had to hope it got bored first.

…“Okay, I have no idea who the hell this woman is. And what on earth is with her get up?”

The woman herself was of Asian descent, kind of skinny and looking like she was in her late twenties or possibly her early thirties. She’s sporting a questionable blue and yellow headband with gems fastened to it with two feathers attached to the side dangling down behind her ear. Her hair was black and long nearly down to her waist but showed signs of having been poorly cared for with clearly visual split ends and what looked to be flowers tied up in there too. She wore a green loose fitting tank top with a purple floral pattern that just barely exposed her midriff. She wore no make up no eye shadow lipstick/gloss or even perfume. And on the topic of smell she smelled a little odd too, not bad at all though. "Probably her own natural scent" you think.

From the waist down she had a skirt with some gray tights that had purposefully had tears in them and cut off at just above her ankles leaving her feet exposed and resting on the table. Speaking of which while dashing to her lap you failed to notice a couple of things one of which being that her nails were unclipped, they were long and like her hair didn’t seem to get a whole lot of attention they didn’t even have any nail polish on them whatsoever. You could even see some dirt stuck beneath her nails as she unconsciously flexed them. Gazing at them more you thank heavens that she didn’t hit you with those she might’ve inadvertently cut you with them you chuckle to yourself. Going through her appearance led you to believe she was some sort of hippie, admittedly you hadn't had much dealing with there kind before. Though this was probably the cutest one you'd come across thus far.

Your mind returns after trailing off and starts focusing on another thing you failed notice. The room was rather large and not just due to your new diminished perspective. It had hard wood floors with a single carpet laid beneath the sofa and table, a couple of exotic plants here and there shelves with some books in them, a fireplace, and a couple large windows with matching drapes. And as soon as your eyes met with the window you immediately felt sick to your stomach, outside you saw trees not even normal ones. Ones you’d find in very dry climate accompanied with dried bushes, dirt, sand, mountains, hills, and rocks lots and lots of rocks with the sun harshly beaming down on them and mountains. You fell to the ground (or rather this woman’s thigh) as this sudden realization hits you “Oh god. I’m nowhere near home, I’m like on the other side of the globe! Is this the desert? Mountains? Am I on the outskirts of Vegas, or Texas or…Something?!?!” All these possible locations filled your head as I tried to come to terms with being small unnoticeable and long, long away from home.

“If it wasn’t for that damn apple, I’d still be at home with my friends and family living my life not this B-movie horror show!” Your fit of rage is immediately interrupted as your landmass begins to move. You start sliding off her thigh as she starts to stand, you grab at her managing to firmly grasp her tights stopping just short of her skirt. She begins to walk to the front door with you in tow scared of being flung off, with each step it feels like being hit with turbulence while on a plane as they slightly jiggle.

info.description:
You were an average American teen. You had two parents and siblings, you went to school everyday, you got average grades and you had a few friends. For you, life was good.

But it was kinda boring...

One day, that changes as you discover a woman selling a magic apple. She wouldn't tell you what it would do, just that it would change your life. So like any other stupid teen, you ate it. That's when the trouble (and the story) begins.
